question.text: Mr. Chan___in charge of operations since the beginning of last year.

answer.explanation: (C) This is a present perfect verb indicating an action that began in the past and continues to the present. Choice (A) is simple present. Choice (B) is simple past. Choice (D) is future.

question.text: The last shipment was refused by the buyer ___ damage that occurred while the product was in transit.

answer.explanation:
"As a result" and "By reason" do not come before nouns.
"According to" only goes with opinions or rules.
Therefore, we use "because of".

question.text: Llnelta Media Group has indicated that growth in its new media revenues last year helped ___ a decrease In television advertising.

answer.explanation: Offset st = Reduce the effects of st

question.text: We returned the table to the store because we___a small flaw on the surface.

answer.explanation: (C) “Detected” means “found” or “saw”. Choices (A), (B), and (D) all look similar to the correct answer but have meanings that don’t fit the context.

question.text: ___ the search committee offers Doctor Rao the position of Professor of Sociology will depend on a vote of its members.
There are many ___ signs that the quality of education is improving in this country.

answer.explanation: We are giving more information on the noun "signs" so we choose an adjective.

question.text: Replacement cartridges for the printer can be found___the top shelf of the supply closet.

answer.explanation: (A) “On” means “on top of”, so is the logical choice to indicate the position of something relative to a shelf. Choices (B), (C), and (D) are not logical.

question.text: The old house on the corner is___down and needs some serious repair work.

answer.explanation: (D) The present participle form is used to complete the present continuous verb in this active-voice sentence. Choice (A) is past tense. Choice (B) is simple present tense. Choice (C) is the past participle.

question.text: Since employees often have to meet with clients with no prior notice, Park Interior Design enforces dress code ___ at all times.
It has been projected that sales organic fruit and vegetables will increase ___ 20 percent this year.
